details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.3 Output intent - Valid ICC output profile
details.description: The profile stream that is the value of the DestOutputProfile key shall either be an output profile (Device Class = "prtr") or a monitor profile (Device Class = "mntr"). The profiles shall have a colour space of either "GRAY", "RGB", or "CMYK".
